data.LABEL: Label
data.INVALID_LABEL_LENGTH: An address label must be between 2 and 50 characters.
data.LABEL_ALREADY_EXISTS: An address is already associated with that label.
data.ADDRESS_ALREADY_EXISTS: That address is already associated with a label.
data.INVALID_ADDRESS: Please enter a valid ETH address.
data.LABEL_CANNOT_BEGIN_WITH_0X: Address labels may not begin with 0x.
data.LABEL_CANNOT_CONTAIN_ENS_SUFFIX: Address labels may not contain ".eth", ".test" or ".reverse".
data.X_PASSWORDDESC: This password * encrypts * your private key. This does not act as a seed to generate your keys. **You will need this password + your keystore file to unlock your wallet.**
data.TX_NOTFOUND_1: This TX cannot be found in the TX Pool of the node you are connected to.
data.TX_NOTFOUND_2: If you just sent the transaction, wait 30 seconds then try again.
data.TX_NOTFOUND_3: It could still be in the TX Pool of a different node, waiting to be mined.
data.TX_NOTFOUND_4: Please use the dropdown in the top-right & select a different node and check again.
data.TX_NOTFOUND_5: Make sure you copied the Transaction Hash correctly
data.X_KEYSTOREDESC: This Keystore file matches the format used by Mist so you can easily import it in the future. It is the recommended file to download and back up.
data.X_PRINTDESC: ProTip: Click print and save this as a PDF, even if you do not own a printer!
data.X_PRIVKEYDESC: This is the unencrypted text version of your private key, meaning no password is necessary. If someone were to find your unencrypted private key, they could access your wallet without a password. For this reason, encrypted versions are typically recommended.
data.CX_WARNING_1: Make sure you have **external backups** of any wallets you store here. Many things could happen that would cause you to lose the data in this Chrome Extension, including uninstalling and reinstalling the extension. This extension is a way to easily access your wallets, **not** a way to back them up.
data.DECRYPT_ACCESS: How would you like to access your assets?
data.SIGNER_SELECT_WALLET: Connect and Unlock with Parity Signer
data.SIGNER_SELECT_WALLET_QR: Open your Parity Signer app on your phone and scan the QR code.
data.SAFET_MINI_DESCRIPTION: Afer you've connected, follow the instructions on screen to access your account.
data.ORDER_SAFE_T: Don‚Äôt have a Safe-T Mini? [Get one now!]()
data.ADD_VIEW_ADDRESS_DESC: View your account & balances using only your address
data.ADD_PARITY_DESC: Connect & sign via your Parity Signer mobile app
data.ADD_PARITY_ERROR_DISABLED: You must enable your webcam to unlock your Parity Signer wallet
data.ADD_PARITY_ERROR_NO_CAM: You need a webcam to unlock your Parity Signer wallet
data.ADD_PARITY_ERROR_UNKNOWN: Unable to access your webcam, please refresh or try another browser
data.ADD_LABEL_3: Your wallet is encrypted. Please enter the password.
data.ADD_WEB3DESC: Connect & sign via your browser or extension
data.ADD_HARDWAREDESC: Connect & sign via your hardware wallet
data.GEN_DESC: If you want to generate multiple wallets, you can do so here
data.GEN_PLACEHOLDER_1: Do NOT forget to save this!
data.GEN_SUCCESSMSG: Success! Your wallet has been generated.
data.GEN_ARIA_1: Enter a strong password (at least 9 characters)
data.BULK_SUCCESSMSG: Success! Your wallets have been generated.
data.SCHEDULING_DESCRIPTION: This allows you to schedule a transaction for sending at a later time. Due to unforeseen circumstances (like the state of the network), we cannot 100% guarantee that your transaction is sent in the time period you specify.
data.SCHEDULE_DEPOSIT_TOOLTIP: Require TimeNode to deposit a given amount of ETH in order to gain an exclusive time window for execution.
data.SCHEDULE_TIMEBOUNTY_TOOLTIP: The amount of ETH you wish to offer to TimeNodes in exchange for execution. The higher the Time Bounty, the likelier your transaction will get executed.
data.SCHEDULE_TIMEBOUNTY_WARNING: You don't have enough funds or the value is invalid.
data.SCHEDULE_WINDOW_SIZE_TOOLTIP_TIME: Range of minutes during which the transaction may be executed.
data.SCHEDULE_WINDOW_SIZE_TOOLTIP_BLOCK: Range of blocks during which the transaction may be executed.
data.SCHEDULE_TRANSACTION_MINING_PART_1: Your transaction is being mined. Please wait.
data.SCHEDULE_TRANSACTION_MINING_PART_2: Click to see it in block explorer.
data.SCHEDULE_TOKEN_TRANSFER_SCHEDULED_ADDRES: This is the address of your scheduled transaction:
data.SCHEDULE_TOKEN_TRANSFER_MINING_PART_1: You need to wait to approve token transfer, it is required for scheduling token transfer transaction.
data.SCHEDULE_TOKEN_TRANSFER_MINING_PART_2: Alternatively, you can come back later and approve it in Chronos Dapp using this link:
data.SCHEDULE_TOKEN_TRANSFER_NOTICE: You are scheduling the send of a token. This requires 2 transactions. Please complete both or your transaction will be executed on time but your token transfer won't take place. You will be automatically redirected after the first tx completes.
data.SCHEDULE_TOKEN_TRANSFER_APPROVE: Token transfer has been scheduled. Now you need to approve this transaction.
data.SCHEDULE_TOKEN_TRANSFER_APPROVE_EXPLANAT: Approving tokens is necessary in order to allow the scheduled transaction to access the amount of tokens you've scheduled at the moment of execution.
data.TRANS_SENDINFO: A standard transaction using 21000 gas will cost 0.000441 ETH. We use a slightly-above-minimum gas price of 0.000000021 ETH to ensure it gets mined quickly. We do not take a transaction fee.
data.OFFLINE_DESC: Generating offline transactions can be done in three steps. You will complete steps 1 and 3 on an online computer, and step 2 on an offline/airgapped computer. This ensures your private keys do not touch an internet-connected device.
data.OFFLINE_STEP1_LABEL_2: Note: This is the FROM address, not the TO address. Nonce is generated from the originating account. If using an airgapped computer, it would be the address of the cold-storage account.
data.OFFLINE_STEP2_LABEL_3B: This was displayed in Step 1 on your online computer.
data.OFFLINE_STEP2_LABEL_4B: 21000 is the default gas limit. When you send contracts or add'l data, this may need to be different. Any unused gas will be returned to you.
data.OFFLINE_STEP2_LABEL_5B: This was displayed in Step 1 on your online computer.
data.OFFLINE_STEP2_LABEL_6B: This is optional. Data is often used when you send transactions to contracts.
data.OFFLINE_STEP2_LABEL_7: Enter / Select your Private Key / JSON.
data.NODE_SUBTITLE: To connect to a local node...
data.NODE_WARNING: Your node must be HTTPS in order to connect to it via MyCrypto.com. You can [download the MyCrypto repo & run it locally](https://download.mycrypto.com/) to connect to any node. Or, get free SSL certificate via [LetsEncrypt](https://letsencrypt.org/)
data.SWAP_UNLOCK: Unlock your wallet to send ETH or Tokens directly from this page.
data.MSG_INFO1: Include the current date so the signature cannot be reused on a different date.
data.MSG_INFO2: Include your nickname and where you use the nickname so someone else cannot use it.
data.MSG_INFO3: Include a specific reason for the message so it cannot be reused for a different purpose.
data.VIEWWALLET_SUBTITLE: This allows you to download different versions of private keys and re-print your paper wallet. You may want to do this in order to [import your account into Geth/Mist](https://ethereum.stackexchange.com/questions/465/how-to-import-a-plain-private-key-into-geth/). If you want to check your balance, we recommend using a blockchain explorer like [etherscan.io](https://etherscan.io/).
data.VIEWWALLET_SUBTITLE_SHORT: This allows you to download different versions of private keys and re-print your paper wallet.
data.VIEWWALLET_SUCCESSMSG: Success! Here are your wallet details.
data.ERROR_1: Your password must be at least 9 characters. Please ensure it is a strong password.
data.ERROR_2: Sorry! We don't recognize this type of wallet file.
data.ERROR_3: This is not a valid wallet file.
data.ERROR_4: This unit doesn't exists, please use the one of the following units
data.ERROR_7: Please enter valid decimals (Must be integer. Try 0-18.)
data.ERROR_8: Please enter a valid gas limit (Must be integer. Try 21000-4000000.)
data.ERROR_9: Please enter a valid data value (Must be hex.)
data.ERROR_10: Please enter a valid gas price. (Must be integer. Try 20 GWEI / 20000000000 WEI.)
data.ERROR_11: Please enter a valid nonce      (Must be integer.)
data.ERROR_13: A wallet with this nickname already exists.
data.ERROR_15: Whoops. It doesn't look like a proposal with this ID exists yet or there is an error reading this proposal.
data.ERROR_16: A wallet with this address already exists in storage. Please check your wallets page.
data.ERROR_17: Account you are sending from does not have enough funds. If sending tokens, you must have 0.01 ETH in your account to cover the cost of gas.
data.ERROR_18: All gas would be used on this transaction. This means you have already voted on this proposal or the debate period has ended.
data.ERROR_21: Could not estimate gas. There are not enough funds in the account, or the receiving contract address would throw an error. Feel free to manually set the gas and proceed. The error message upon sending may be more informative.
data.ERROR_22: Please enter a valid node name
data.ERROR_23: Please enter a valid URL. If you are on https, your URL must be https
data.ERROR_25: Please enter a valid chain ID.
data.ERROR_29: Please enter a valid user and password.
data.ERROR_30: Please enter a valid name (7+ characters, limited punctuation)
data.ERROR_31: Please enter a valid secret phrase.
data.ERROR_32: Could not connect to the node. Refresh your page, try a different node (upper right corner), check your firewall settings. If custom node, check your configs.
data.ERROR_33: The wallet you have unlocked does not match the owner's address.
data.ERROR_34: The name you are attempting to reveal does not match the name you have entered.
data.SUCCESS_3: Your TX has been broadcast to the network. It is waiting to be mined & confirmed. During ICOs, it may take 3+ hours to confirm. Use the Verify & Check buttons below to see. TX Hash:
data.WARN_SEND_LINK: You arrived via a link that has the address, value, gas, data fields, or transaction type (send mode) filled in for you. You can change any information before sending. Unlock your wallet to get started.
data.ONBOARD_WELCOME_CONTENT__1: Please take some time to understand this for your own safety. üôè
data.ONBOARD_WELCOME_CONTENT__2: Your funds will be stolen if you do not heed these warnings.
data.ONBOARD_WELCOME_CONTENT__3: We know this click-through stuff is annoying. We are sorry.
data.ONBOARD_WELCOME_CONTENT__5: MyCrypto is a free, open-source, client-side interface.
data.ONBOARD_WELCOME_CONTENT__6: We allow you to interact directly with the blockchain while remaining in full control of your keys & your funds.
data.ONBOARD_WELCOME_CONTENT__7: **You** and **only you** are responsible for your security.
data.ONBOARD_WELCOME_CONTENT__8: We cannot recover your funds or freeze your account if you visit a phishing site or lose your private key.
data.ONBOARD_BANK_CONTENT__1: When you open an account with a bank or exchange, they create an account for you in their system.
data.ONBOARD_BANK_CONTENT__2: The bank keeps track of your personal information, account passwords, balances, transactions and ultimately your money.
data.ONBOARD_BANK_CONTENT__3: The bank charge fees to manage your account and provide services, like refunding transactions when your card gets stolen.
data.ONBOARD_BANK_CONTENT__4: The bank allows you to write a check or charge your debit card to send money, go online to check your balance, reset your password, and get a new debit card if you lose it.
data.ONBOARD_BANK_CONTENT__5: You have an account *with the bank or exchange* and they decide how much money you can send, where you can send it, and how long to hold on a suspicious deposit. All for a fee.
data.ONBOARD_INTERFACE_CONTENT__1: When you create an account on MyCrypto you are generating a cryptographic set of numbers: your private key and your public key (address).
data.ONBOARD_INTERFACE_CONTENT__2: The handling of your keys happens entirely on your computer, inside your browser.
data.ONBOARD_INTERFACE_CONTENT__3: We never transmit, receive or store your private key, password, or other account information.
data.ONBOARD_INTERFACE_CONTENT__4: We do not charge a transaction fee.
data.ONBOARD_INTERFACE_CONTENT__5: You are simply using our **interface** to interact **directly with the blockchain**.
data.ONBOARD_INTERFACE_CONTENT__6: If you send your *public key (address)* to someone, they can send you ETH or tokens. üëç
data.ONBOARD_INTERFACE_CONTENT__7: If you send your *private key* to someone, they now have full control of your account. üëé
data.ONBOARD_BLOCKCHAIN_SKIP: I already know what a blockchain is...
data.ONBOARD_BLOCKCHAIN_CONTENT__1: The blockchain is like a huge, global, decentralized spreadsheet.
data.ONBOARD_BLOCKCHAIN_CONTENT__2: It keeps track of who sent how many coins to whom, and what the balance of every account is.
data.ONBOARD_BLOCKCHAIN_CONTENT__3: It is stored and maintained by thousands of people (miners) across the globe who have special computers.
data.ONBOARD_BLOCKCHAIN_CONTENT__4: The blocks in the blockchain are made up of all the individual transactions sent from MyCrypto, MetaMask, Exodus, Mist, Geth, Parity, and everywhere else.
data.ONBOARD_BLOCKCHAIN_CONTENT__5: When you see your balance on MyCrypto.com or view your transactions on [etherscan.io](https://etherscan.io), you are seeing data on the blockchain, not in our personal systems.
data.ONBOARD_WHY_TITLE: Why are you making me read all this?
data.ONBOARD_WHY_CONTENT__1: Because we need you to understand that we **cannot**...
data.ONBOARD_WHY_CONTENT__2: Access your account or send your funds for you.
data.ONBOARD_WHY_CONTENT__3: Recover or change your private key.
data.ONBOARD_WHY_CONTENT__7: **You** and **only you** are responsible for your security.
data.ONBOARD_WHY_CONTENT__8: Be diligent to keep your private key and password safe. Your private key is sometimes called your mnemonic phrase, keystore file, UTC file, JSON file,  wallet file.
data.ONBOARD_WHY_CONTENT__9: If you lose your private key or password, no one can recover it.
data.ONBOARD_WHY_CONTENT__10: If you enter your private key on a phishing website, you will have **all your funds taken**.
data.ONBOARD_POINT_TITLE__ALT: What's the Point of MyCrypto then?
data.ONBOARD_WHYMYC_TITLE: If MyCrypto can't do those things, what's the point?
data.ONBOARD_WHYMYC_CONTENT__1: Because that is the point of decentralization and the blockchain.
data.ONBOARD_WHYMYC_CONTENT__2: You don't have to rely on your bank, government, or anyone else when you want to move your funds.
data.ONBOARD_WHYMYC_CONTENT__3: You don't have to rely on the security of an exchange or bank to keep your funds safe.
data.ONBOARD_WHYMYC_CONTENT__4: If you don't find these things valuable, ask yourself why you think the blockchain and cryptocurrencies are valuable. üòâ
data.ONBOARD_WHYMYC_CONTENT__5: If you don't like the sound of this, consider using [Coinbase](https://www.coinbase.com/) or [Blockchain.info](https://blockchain.info/wallet/#/signup). They have more familiar accounts with usernames & passwords.
data.ONBOARD_WHYMYC_CONTENT__6: If you are scared but want to use MyCrypto, [get a hardware wallet](https://support.mycrypto.com/staying-safe/hardware-wallet-recommendations)! These keep your keys secure.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_TITLE: How To Protect Yourself & Your Funds
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_1_TITLE: How To Protect Yourself from Phishers
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_1_CONTENT__1: Phishers send you a message with a link to a website that looks just like MyCrypto, EtherDelta, Paypal, or your bank, but is not the real website. They steal your information and then steal your money.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_1_CONTENT__2: Install [EAL](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/etheraddresslookup/pdknmigbbbhmllnmgdfalmedcmcefdfn) or [MetaMask](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/metamask/nkbihfbeogaeaoehlefnkodbefgpgknn) or [Cryptonite by Metacert](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/cryptonite-by-metacert/keghdcpemohlojlglbiegihkljkgnige) to block malicious websites.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_1_CONTENT__4: Always make sure the URL bar has `MyCrypto, Inc (US)` in green.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_1_CONTENT__5: Do not trust messages or links sent to you randomly via email, Slack, Reddit, Twitter, etc.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_1_CONTENT__6: Always navigate directly to a site before you enter information. Do not enter information after clicking a link from a message or email.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_1_CONTENT__7: [Install an AdBlocker](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ublock-origin/cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm?hl=en) and do not click ads on your search engine (e.g. Google).
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_2_TITLE: How To Protect Yourself from Scams
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_2_CONTENT__1: People will try to get you to give them money in return for nothing.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_2_CONTENT__2: If it is too good to be true, it probably is.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_2_CONTENT__3: Research before sending money to someone or some project. Look for information on a variety of websites and forums. Be wary.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_2_CONTENT__4: Ask questions when you don't understand something or it doesn't seem right.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_2_CONTENT__5: Don't let fear, FUD, or FOMO win over common sense. If something is very urgent, ask yourself "why?". It may be to create FOMO or prevent you from doing research.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_3_TITLE: How To Protect Yourself from Loss
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_3_CONTENT__1: If you lose your private key or password, it is gone forever. Don't lose it.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_3_CONTENT__2: Make a backup of your private key and password. Do NOT just store it on your computer. Print it out on a piece of paper or save it to a USB drive.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_3_CONTENT__3: Store this paper or USB drive in a different physical location. A backup is not useful if it is destroyed by a fire or flood along with your laptop.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_3_CONTENT__4: Do not store your private key in Dropbox, Google Drive, or other cloud storage. If that account is compromised, your funds will be stolen.
data.ONBOARD_SECURE_3_CONTENT__5: If you have more than 1-week's worth of pay worth of cryptocurrency, get a hardware wallet. No excuses. It's worth it. I promise.
data.ONBOARD_FINAL_SUBTITLE: Sorry for being like this. Onwards!
data.ONBOARD_FINAL_CONTENT__3: How to Set up MyCrypto + MetaMask
data.ONBOARD_FINAL_CONTENT__4: How to Run MyCrypto Offline / Locally
data.ONBOARD_FINAL_CONTENT__5: How to Send via Ledger hardware wallet
data.ONBOARD_FINAL_CONTENT__6: How to Send via TREZOR hardware wallet
data.ONBOARD_FINAL_CONTENT__9: OMG, please just let me send FFS.
data.ONBOARD_RESUME: It looks like you didn't finish reading through these slides last time. ProTip: Finish reading through the slides üòâ
data.GENERATE_WALLET_TITLE: Choose The Wallet That‚Äôs Right For You
data.GENERATE_WALLET_SUGGESTIONS: We suggest using one of the following secure wallets
data.GENERATE_WALLET_WARNING: Managing your own keys can be risky and a single mistake can lead to irrecoverable loss. If you are new to cryptocurrencies, we strongly recommend using [MetaMask]($metamask_link) or purchasing a [Ledger]($ledger_link) or [TREZOR]($trezor_link) hardware wallet.
data.GENERATE_WALLET_HELPLINK_1: Learn more about different wallet types & staying secure
data.GENERATE_WALLET_KEYSTORE_1: An encrypted JSON file, protected by a password
data.GENERATE_WALLET_KEYSTORE_2: Back it up on a USB drive
data.GENERATE_WALLET_KEYSTORE_3: Cannot be written, printed, or easily transferred to mobile
data.GENERATE_WALLET_KEYSTORE_5: Provides a single address for sending and receiving
data.GENERATE_WALLET_MNEMONIC_2: Back it up on paper or USB drive
data.GENERATE_WALLET_MNEMONIC_3: Can be written, printed, and easily typed on mobile, too
data.GENERATE_WALLET_MNEMONIC_4: Compatible with MetaMask, Jaxx, imToken, and more
data.GENERATE_WALLET_MNEMONIC_5: Provides unlimited addresses for sending and receiving
data.WALLET_SUGGESTION_HARDWARE_1: A dedicated device that generates and holds onto your private key
data.WALLET_SUGGESTION_HARDWARE_2: Transactions are signed on the device
data.WALLET_SUGGESTION_HARDWARE_4: Costs money, may be on backorder
data.WALLET_SUGGESTION_METAMASK_1: A browser extension that generates and holds onto your private key
data.WALLET_SUGGESTION_METAMASK_2: Transactions are signed and sent through the extension
data.WALLET_SUGGESTION_METAMASK_3: Works on any Web3 enabled site
data.WALLET_SUGGESTION_PARITYSIGNER_1: A mobile app that generates and holds onto your private key
data.WALLET_SUGGESTION_PARITYSIGNER_2: Transactions are signed via QR codes
data.WALLET_SUGGESTION_GENERATE_2: Choice between keystore file and mnemonic phrase
data.WALLET_SUGGESTION_GENERATE_5: Commonly a target for phishing and hacking
data.WALLET_SUGGESTION_DESKTOP_APP_DESC: Where you can generate your own private key in a secure, sandboxed environment
data.PREFOOTER_WARNING: MyCrypto.com does not hold your keys for you. We cannot access accounts, recover keys, reset passwords, nor reverse transactions. Protect your keys & always check that you are on the correct URL.
data.PREFOOTER_SECURITY_WARNING: You are responsible for your security.
data.FOOTER_ABOUT: MyCrypto is an open-source, client-side tool for generating ether wallets, handling ERC-20 tokens, and interacting with the blockchain more easily. Developed by and for the community since 2015, we‚Äôre focused on building awesome products that put the power in people‚Äôs hands.
data.LEDGER_TIP: After you've connected, follow the instructions on screen to access your account.
data.LEDGER_WRONG_APP: Wrong application selected on your device
data.TREZOR_TIP: After you've connected, follow the instructions on screen to access your account.
data.INPUT_PASSWORD_PLACEHOLDER: Password must use at least $pass_length characters
data.GENERATE_KEYSTORE_FAILED: Keystore generation failed or was invalid. In order to prevent loss of funds, we cannot provide you with a keystore file that may be corrupted. Refresh the page or use a different browser, and try again.
data.MNEMONIC_DESCRIPTION_1: Click the words of your phrase in order. If you've forgotten the next word, click the 'Reveal Next Word' button below.
data.MNEMONIC_DESCRIPTION_2: Write these words down. Do not copy them to your clipboard, or save them anywhere online.
data.HELP_ARTICLE_1: Learn how Ledger works with MyCrypto
data.WALLET_LOGOUT_MODAL_TITLE: You are about to log out
data.WALLET_LOGOUT_MODAL_DESC: Leaving this page will log you out. Are you sure you want to continue?
data.MNEMONIC_FINAL_DESCRIPTION: All done, you‚Äôre now ready to access your wallet. Just follow these 4 steps whenever you want to access your wallet.
data.VIEW_ONLY_ENTER: Enter an address (e.g. 0x4bbeEB066eD09...) or an ENS address (example.eth)
data.INSECURE_WALLET_TYPE_DESC: Entering your $wallet_type on any website is dangerous. If MyCrypto.com was compromised, or you accidentally visited a phishing website, you could lose your funds. Because of that, we have disabled the use of $wallet_type wallets through the website. In order to access your account, please download MyCrypto and run it locally.
data.DL_WALLET_WARNING_1: **Don't lose it!** It can't be recovered if you lose it.
data.DL_WALLET_WARNING_2: **Don't share it!** Your funds will be stolen if you use this file on a malicious site.
data.DL_WALLET_WARNING_3: **Make a Backup!** Secure it like the millions of dollars it may one day be worth.
data.SWAP_SUPPORT: Issue with your Swap? Contact support
data.SWAP_SUPPORT_LINK_BROKEN: Click here if link doesn't work
data.SWAP_TIME_LIMIT_WARNING: Orders that take too long will have to be processed manually and may delay the amount of time it takes to receive your coins.
data.ENS_DESCRIPTION: The [Ethereum Name Service]($ens_docs) (ENS) is a distributed, open, and extensible naming system based on the Ethereum blockchain. Once you have a name, you can tell your friends to send ETH to `ensdomain.eth` instead of `$example_donation_addr...`
data.ENS_DOMAIN_INVALID: **$name** is not currently a valid ENS name.
data.ENS_DOMAIN_REVEAL: It's time to reveal the bids for  **$name**
data.ENS_INVALID_INPUT: Names must be at least 7 characters and contain no special characters. Auctions for ENS names with less than 7 characters will be open in the summer of 2019.
data.ENS_SEND_TO_MANAGER: Head over to the ENS Manager to register, update, or migrate **$name** now.
data.NAME_AUCTION_PROMPT_BID: Want to place a bid on **$name.eth**?
data.SIGN_MSG_PLACEHOLDER: This message you're signing proves you own the address you say you do.
data.CHECK_TX_STATUS_DESCRIPTION_1: Enter your Transaction Hash to check on its status.
data.CHECK_TX_STATUS_DESCRIPTION_2: If you don‚Äôt know your Transaction Hash, you can look it up on [$block_explorer]($block_explorer_link) by looking up your address.
data.CHECK_TX_STATUS_DESCRIPTION_MULTIPLE: If you don‚Äôt know your Transaction Hash, you can look it up on [$block_explorer]($block_explorer_link) or [$block_explorer_2]($block_explorer_link_2) by looking up your address.

data.NO_RECENT_TX_FOUND: No recent MyCrypto transactions found, try checking on $explorer.
data.INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: WARNING: Your ether or token balance isn't high enough to complete this transaction. Please send more funds or switch to a different wallet.
data.ERROR_GAS_LIMIT_LOW: Gas limit must be at least $limit for transactions
data.ERROR_GAS_LIMIT_HIGH: Gas price too high. Please contact support if this was not a mistake.
data.X_JSONDESC: This is the unencrypted, JSON format of your private key. This means you do not need the password but anyone who finds your JSON can access your wallet & Ether without the password.
data.APP_UPDATE_TITLE: There‚Äôs a new & improved version of MyCrypto available!
data.APP_UPDATE_TITLE_CRITICAL: There is a Critical Security Update Available for MyCrypto!
data.APP_UPDATE_BODY: We know it‚Äôs annoying, but updating your app fixes bugs, enables fun features, and ensures your app is secure.
data.APP_UPDATE_BODY_CRITICAL: You can learn more about this critical update here:
data.APP_UPDATE_WARNING: We‚Äôve just released an update that resolves an important issue. Please install the update now.
data.WELCOME_MODAL_BETA: Thank you for testing the beta! People like you made this launch possible
data.WELCOME_MODAL_INTRO: Welcome to the all new MyCrypto! We've made some cool new changes to the site that we're excited to show you. Beyond the new and improved look and feel of the site, we've also added a ton of new features:
data.WELCOME_MODAL_FEATURE_2: Combined Send, Info, and Send Offline tabs
data.WELCOME_MODAL_LINKS: Help out with any issues you find by [reporting bugs on GitHub](https://github.com/MyCryptoHQ/MyCrypto/issues) or [HackerOne](https://hackerone.com/mycrypto). Need something from the old site, or just miss that clunky feel? We've kept it up as [MyCrypto Legacy](https://legacy.mycrypto.com).
data.HARDWARE_PROMO: Learn more about protecting your funds.
data.ENCLAVE_LEDGER_IN_USE: Your Ledger is currently in use with another application. Please wait, or close other wallet applications before trying again.
data.SELECT_WHICH_TOKENS: Select which tokens you would like to keep track of'
data.YOU_ARE_INTERACTING: You are interacting with the $network network.
data.USING_PAYMENT_ID: Using the required Payment ID of:
data.PAYMENT_ID_WARNING: Don't forget to send your XMR with the payment ID [[?]](https://getmonero.org/resources/moneropedia/paymentid.html) above, or you WILL lose your funds.
data.ANNOUNCEMENT_MESSAGE: MyCrypto.com no longer allows the use of private keys, mnemonics, or keystore files in the browser. To continue using them, please download the [MyCrypto Desktop App](https://download.mycrypto.com).
data.U2F_NOT_SUPPORTED: The U2F standard that hardware wallets use does not seem to be supported by your browser. Please try again using Google Chrome.
data.SIMILAR_TRANSACTION_ERROR: This transaction is very similar to a recent transaction. Please wait a few moments and try again, or click 'Advanced' and manually set the nonce to a new value.
data.METAMASK_PERMISSION_DENIED: You denied the request for permission to access MetaMask, but permission is required to unlock your wallet. Please click "Connect to MetaMask", and then click "Approve" when the dialog opens.
data.NEW_FOOTER_TEXT_4: Get updates from MyCrypto straight to your inbox!
data.NEW_FOOTER_TEXT_13: MyCrypto is an open-source, client-side tool for generating ether wallets, handling ERC-20 tokens, and interacting with the blockchain more easily. Developed by and for the community since 2015, we‚Äôre focused on building awesome products that put the power in people‚Äôs hands.
data.NEW_FOOTER_TEXT_14: Your email was added to our mailing list!
data.NEW_SIDEBAR_TEXT_2: Select Your Preferred Network and Node
data.NEW_SIDEBAR_TEXT_3: You can access your MyCrypto funds on different Networks and Nodes, simply choose one below or add a custom node.
data.NEW_SIDEBAR_TEXT_5: Your node must be HTTPS in order to connect to it via MyCrypto.com. You can download the MyCrypto repo & run it locally to connect to any node. Or, get free SSL certificate via LetsEncrypt
data.SWAP_1: The ability to exchange currency on MyCrypto is provided through ShapeShift. To enable the functionality of this page, please authorize your account. For more information, please visit our [Knowledge Base article](https://support.mycrypto.com/faq/why-do-i-need-to-sign-in-with-shapeshift-now.html). Don't have a ShapeShift account? Create one [here](https://auth.shapeshift.io/signup).
data.SWAP_5: Lost ShapeShift access token. Please reauthorize.
data.CUSTOM_TOKEN_1: A token with this address already exists.
data.CUSTOM_TOKEN_2: A token with this symbol already exists.
data.ACCESS_MESSAGE_1: You must access your wallet in order to send a transaction.
data.ACCESS_MESSAGE_2: You must access your wallet in order to request a payment.
data.ACCESS_MESSAGE_3: You must access your wallet in order to view your wallet's information.
data.ACCESS_MESSAGE_4: You must access your wallet in order to view your recent transactions.
data.ACCESS_MESSAGE_5: You must access your wallet in order to view your address book.
data.SETTINGS_TOOLTIP: Your MyCrypto Settings include the Accounts in your MyCrypto Wallet, your Saved Address, and other preferences. We will only export or import your MyCrypto Settings. This does not include private keys and exporting is not a way to backup private keys.
data.SETTINGS_EXPORT_INFO: Your MyCrypto settings file is ready.
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_COPY: Upload the MyCrypto settings file that you previously exported
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_INVALID: The file you've selected is not a MyCrypto Settings JSON file. Please select the proper file.
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_PASTE: or drop your MyCrypto Settings file here.
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_SUCCESS: You will see the imported files in settings!
data.HOME_WALLETS_DESCRIPTION: Use with your favorite hardware and software wallets:
data.HOME_PEACE_OF_MIND_DESCRIPTION: MyCrypto puts your safety & security first.
data.HOME_PEACE_OF_MIND_VAULT: Get your information out of other people's hands and back into yours.
data.HOME_PEACE_OF_MIND_PROTECT: Protect yourself from phishing attacks and malicious extensions.
data.HOME_PEACE_OF_MIND_OPENSOURCE: Open-source, fully audited, and fully verifiable.
data.HOME_DOWNLOAD_TITLE: Everything is Even More Secure with our Desktop App
data.HOME_DOWNLOAD_DESCRIPTION: Keep your keys out of the browser with the MyCrypto Desktop App. You get more access to your funds, and scammers get less access to you.
data.HOME_GET_STARTED_DESCRIPTION:
It's Time To Use MyCrypto 
 For Your Crypto.
data.HOME_BOTTOM_TITLE: Ready to start managing your funds safely and confidently?
data.HOME_BOTTOM_HELP: Have Questions? We're Here to Help!
data.HOME_FEATURES_TITLE: Managing and storing your assets has never been easier.
data.HOME_FEATURES_DESCRIPTION: The MyCrypto apps put your safety & security first.
data.HOME_FEATURES_MANAGE_DESCRIPTION: MyCrypto allows you to create, import, and manage all the wallets you'll ever need.
data.HOME_FEATURES_VIEW_DESCRIPTION: See a detailed breakdown of all your wallets, tokens, and transactions.
data.HOME_FEATURES_CONTROL_DESCRIPTION: Manage your information and your cryptocurrency easily and without fear.
data.HOME_KEEP_SAFE_TITLE: A Different Way to Keep Your Assets Safe
data.HOME_KEEP_SAFE_BANKS_DESCRIPTION:
They control your account 
 They own your info 
 They add fees 
 They tell you what you can do
data.HOME_KEEP_SAFE_MYCRYPTO_DESCRIPTION:
You control your ‚Äùaccount‚Äù 
 You own your info 
 No fees are added 
 You do whatever you want
data.DOWNLOAD_APP_DESCRIPTION: Please download the MyCrypto Desktop app so you can securely complete creating your new account and start managing your funds.
data.NO_ACCOUNTS_HEADER: You don't have any accounts in your wallet.
data.NO_ACCOUNTS_DESCRIPTION:
To access your funds add one of your existing 
 accounts or create a new account now.
data.PRIVATE_KEY_HELP: Not working? [Here's some troubleshooting tips to try.](https://support.mycrypto.com/troubleshooting/accessing-wallet/private-key-not-working)
data.DOWNLOAD_APP_FOOTER_LABEL: Have a private key, keystore file, or mnemonic phrase?
data.DOWNLOAD_APP_FOOTER_LINK: Download our desktop application to use them.
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Select from the options below to unlock your account and manage your assets.
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_NETWORK_SELCT: Select the blockchain that you want to operate with and the network it connects through. Not sure what to choose? Stick with the default choices below and click next.
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_METAMASK_DESC: After you've connected, follow the instructions on the screen to access your account
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_METAMASK_HELP: Learn how Metamask works with MyCrypto
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_WEB3_INSTALL_DESC: Our recommended desktop Web3Provider is the Metamask.io browser extension. Download now to get started!
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_WEB3_INSTALL_FOOTER: Using a Keystore File or a Mnemonic Phrase?
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_WEB3_INSTALL_FOOTER_LINK: Download the Desktop App to unlock your wallet
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_WEB3_INSTALL_MOBILE_DESC: Download our recommended Web3Provider apps to get started now!
data.DOWNLOAD_APP_FOOTER_INFO_LINK: Learn more about our desktop app.
data.SCREEN_LOCK_NEW_HEADING: Create Password to Lock Your Wallet
data.SCREEN_LOCK_NEW_DESCRIPTION: We want to help you keep your funds safe! Please create a password so you can securly view your wallet when you come back to MyCrypto.
data.INPUT_ERROR_PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least 8 characters long
data.SCREEN_LOCK_FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Unlike the traditional, centralized web, we cannot recover your password.
data.SCREEN_LOCK_FORGOT_PASSWORD_ADDITIONAL_D: You can import your MyCrypto Settings to regain access to your wallet. If you don't have your MyCrypto Settings, you can start from scratch and re-import your accounts.
data.SCREEN_LOCK_LOCKED_DESCRIPTION: We‚Äôve detected that you have a MyCrypto wallet already. Type in your password to continue.
data.SCREEN_LOCK_LOCKED_RECOMMEND_LOCK: Why do we recommend screen lock?
data.SCREEN_LOCK_LOCKED_WRONG_PASSWORD: Sorry, that is not the correct screen lock password. You created this password on MyCrypto when you first set up your Screen Lock. It is not the password you use for your keystore file or mnemonic phrase.
data.SCREEN_LOCK_LOCKING_DESCRIPTION: You‚Äôve been inactive for 5 minutes. In order to keep your funds safe, Your Wallet will be automatically locked in
data.NEW_WALLET_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION_2: Enter a strong, easy-to-remember **password** to create your **keystore file.** This password will encrypt your **private key.** It is not used as a seed.
data.NEW_WALLET_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION_3: **Don‚Äôt forget your password.** You will need the password and your keystore file to access your account in the future.
data.SELECT_NETWORK_DESCRIPTION: Select the blockchain that you want to operate with. Not sure what to choose? Stick with the default choice below and click next.
data.SAVE_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION_1: **Don't lose it.** It can't be recovered if you lose it.
data.SAVE_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION_2: **Don't share it.** Your funds will be stolen if you use this on a malicious site.
data.SAVE_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION_3: **Keep it offline.** Your funds are safest offline (on a USB drive or something similar). We don't recommend keeping your file on any cloud services like Dropbox, Google Drive, etc.
data.MAKE_BACKUP_DESCRIPTION_1: Remember, a **private key** + a **password** = a **keystore file.**
data.MAKE_BACKUP_DESCRIPTION_2: Make a backup of your **private key** in case you ever lose your **keystore file.**
data.MAKE_BACKUP_DESCRIPTION_3: We recommend you print it out twice and store them in two separate, safe, and secret locations. Do not share them with others, save them online, or take a photo of them.
data.VERIFY_KEYSTORE_TITLE: Verify Keystore File or Private Key
data.VERIFY_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION: Select your keystore file or enter your private key to ensure you have it backed up properly.
data.VERIFY_KEYSTORE_EMPTY_FORM_ERROR:
Please select your keystore file or enter your 
 private key.
data.KEYSTORE_HELP: Not working? [Here's some troubleshooting tips to try](https://support.mycrypto.com/how-to/accessing-wallet/how-to-access-your-wallet-with-keystore-file)
data.MNEMONIC_HELP: Not working? [Here's some troubleshooting tips to try](https://support.mycrypto.com/how-to/accessing-wallet/how-to-access-your-wallet-with-mnemonic-phrase)
data.MNEMONIC_TOOL_TIP: If you created a Mnemonic Phrase on another website, you may have a password for this account
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_CREATED_DESCRIPTION: Your account with the address **$address** has been successfully created!
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_DESCRIPTION_ADD: Your dashboard now shows all your accounts and their balances. Use the ‚ÄúAll Accounts‚Äù dropdown to filter your accounts. Or, check out some other helpful resources.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_RESOURCE_LOSE: How do I make sure I don't lose crypto?
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_ADDED_DESCRIPTION: Your account with the address **$address** has been successfully added!
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_NOT_ADDED_TITLE: Your account could not been added.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_NOT_ADDED_DESCRIPTI: Your account with the address **$address** could not be successfully added. This can be due to an invalid network being selected, or if the account is already present on your dashboard.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_SAVE_DASHBOARD_DESCRIPTION: You've spent a lot of time customizing your dashboard. Make sure to back it up so you don‚Äôt lose your settings.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_PRINT_WALLET_DESCRIPTION:
Ensure you never lose access to your assets. 
 Print your paper wallet and store it somewhere safe.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_GET_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: Keep your funds safe offline with Trezor or Ledger.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_ONBOARDING_PLEASE_UNDERSTA: Recover, reset, or modify ANY of your information
data.NOTIFICATIONS_ONBOARDING_RESPONSIBLE_PHI: Making sure you‚Äôre not on a [phishing site]($link)
data.NOTIFICATIONS_ONBOARDING_RESPONSIBLE_MYC: Reducing risk by using the [MyCrypto Desktop App]($link)
data.WEB3_ONUNLOCK_NOT_FOUND_ERROR: Please unlock your Metamask before continuing.
data.RECEIVE_FORM_TOOLTIP: Share this QR code with the party who will be fulfilling the payment request. The party will need to scan the QR code with their preferred crypto app. We recommend [Ambo.io!](https://ambo.io/)
data.MNEMONIC_GENERATE_PHRASE_DESCRIPTION_1: A **Mnemonic Phrase** is a list of 12 words (below) and is the **secret** to unlocking your account and accessing your crypto assets.
data.MNEMONIC_GENERATE_PHRASE_DESCRIPTION_2: **Don‚Äôt lose it.** It can‚Äôt be recovered if you lose it.
data.MNEMONIC_GENERATE_PHRASE_DESCRIPTION_3: **Don‚Äôt share it.** Your funds will be stolen if you use this file on a malicious site.
data.MNEMONIC_MAKE_BACKUP_DESCRIPTION: Write down your **Mnemonic Phrase** on two pieces of paper. Store them in two separate, safe, and secret locations. Do not share them with others, save them online, or take a photo of them.
data.MNEMONIC_VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: Select each word in order to ensure you backed up your Mnemonic Phrase properly.
data.CREATE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION_1: Your account accesses your crypto assets, which are stored on the blockchain.
data.CREATE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION_2: Each account has two parts: an address and a secret. Secrets come in many formats: a private key, a keystore file, or the recommended mnemonic phrase.
data.CREATE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION_3: Don‚Äôt worry, it‚Äôs easier than it sounds. You can do this!
data.CREATE_WALLET_WITH_KEYSTORE_BOTTOM_ACTIO: Don‚Äôt want to use a phrase?
data.WALLET_BREAKDOWN_NO_ASSETS_MORE: You can [buy some ETH](https://buy.mycrypto.com/) with your credit card to get started!
data.NO_ACCOUNTS_SELECTED_DESCRIPTION: To view your balances, select at least one account in the dropdown above.
data.TO_FIELD_ERROR: Enter a valid address or ENS name
data.404_DESCRIPTION: Looks like you got lost somewhere along the way. Don't worry, the wizard can help you get back!
data.SIGN_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: To sign message, please unlock your account first. Select from the options below.
data.VERIFY_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: To verify message, please paste a signature below.
